title: Pork fillet with four peppercorn sauce
ingredients: ['2 pork fillets, sliced to about 3cm thick', '3 tablespoons brandy', '8 slices prosciutto', '2 tablespoons mixed peppercorns (white, red, green and black)', '125ml white wine', '5 crimini mushrooms, sliced', '50g butter', 'salt to taste', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '300ml double cream', '1/2 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves']
